long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chatsup: The Ultimate WhatsApp Bulk Sender for Businesses

You can send Quick Messages, Button Messages, Excel Import, Send
Message Without Saving On WhatsApp Web using Chatsup

Transform your WhatsApp marketing with Chatsup, the powerful Chrome
extension for WhatsApp bulk messaging. Designed for businesses of all
sizes, Chatsup simplifies customer engagement by allowing you to send
personalized messages, pictures, videos, and documents directly from your
browser.

Whether you're reaching out to new leads or nurturing existing
relationships, Chatsup is your go-to solution for efficient and effective
communication.

With Chatsup Bulk WhatsApp Chrome Extension you can:

● Send personalized message, picture, video and document
● Send message from excel
● Send to group members 1 by 1
● Customizable sending interval
● Current sending progress
● Pause and resume at any time

Features

Advanced Messaging Capabilities: Send bulk messages with ease,
directly from Excel files. Chatsup supports the sending of personalized
messages to group members individually, enhancing the personal touch in
your communications.

Customizable Sending Intervals & Progress Tracking: Tailor your
sending intervals to match your campaign needs. Monitor the current
progress of your message delivery in real-time, with options to pause,
resume, and adjust as needed.

Inbox Organization Tools: Keep your WhatsApp inbox tidy and efficient.
Our extension offers features to categorize messages and chats, helping
you stay organized and focused on what matters most.

Communication at Scale: Reach a broader audience with our
broadcasting feature. Send messages to multiple contacts at once without
the need for pre-approval, ensuring your message gets across quickly and
effectively.

Compliance and Safety: Chatsup is designed with compliance in mind,
adhering to WhatsApp’s policies to ensure responsible use. Our tool
prioritizes the safety and privacy of your messages, giving you peace of
mind.

Different Messaging sending modes: Chatsup has different modes to
send messages such as turbo mode. These help you to send messages
strategically and easily.

WhatsApp number filter: You can easily filter out WhatsApp and Non-
WhatsApp numbers using this feature.

Why Choose Chatsup?

Chatsup stands out as the premier bulk WhatsApp sender Chrome
extension, offering unmatched features and functionality. Our commitment
to innovation, user-friendly design, and responsible messaging makes
Chatsup the smart choice for businesses looking to leverage WhatsApp for
marketing and customer engagement.

Join the growing number of satisfied users who have elevated their
WhatsApp marketing with Chatsup. Start expanding your business today
and experience the benefits of efficient, personalized communication at
scale.

Disclaimer: Chatsup is not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by,
or in any way officially connected with WhatsApp or Meta Inc. WhatsApp is
a registered trademark of Meta Inc.

How to avoid WhatsApp Number Ban?

When using Chatsup Bulk WhatsApp sender chrome extension, you need
to keep in mind the following things to avoid number banning.

-Use interval feature to send messages in predetermined intervals.
-In the beginning, send sets of 100 messages. Later on, you can increase
this limit.
- Use Multiple numbers (If available), this reduces the spamming.
